title: ABD-İran görüşmeleri çıkmaza girdi: Balistik füze konusu da konuşulmalı
content: ABD Dışişleri Bakanı Rubio yaptığı açıklamada, " İran ile yapılacak görüşmelerin anlamlı olması için, balistik füze konusu da ele alınmalı" dedi. RUBİO'DAN İRAN AÇIKLAMASI Tahran'da patlak verip tüm ülkeye yayılan gösterilerin ardından savaş noktasına gelen İran ile ABD arasındaki nükleer müzakere görüşmeleri daha gerçekleşmeden patlak verdi. İlk başta İstanbul'da yapılacağı söylenen görüşmelerin yeri olarak Umman'ın gösterilmesinin ardından ABD Dışişleri Bakanı Marco Rubio'dan dikkat çeken bir açıklama geldi. "BALİSTİK FÜZE KONUSU DA GÖRÜŞMELERDE ELE ALINMALI" Görüşme yerinin hala netleşmediğini, Türkiye 'de yapılmasına onay verdikten sonra İran'ın kabul etmediğine dikkat çeken Rubio, "balistik füze" şartı da koştu. Rubio, "Türkiye'de görüşeceğiz zannettik, hala çalışıyoruz. İran ile yapılacak görüşmelerin anlamlı olması için, balistik füze konusu da ele alınmalı" dedi. "MÜZAKERE MASASI ÇÖKTÜ" İDDİASI ABD basınından Axios ise, müzakere masasının çöktüğünü yazdı. Axios, ABD'nin İran'ın görüşme formatı ve yerini değiştirme şartlarını kabul etmediğini iddia etti. TRUMP: BİR ŞEYLER YAPMAK İSTİYORLAR Öte yandan ABD Başkanı Donald Trump, 2 haftalık geçici finansmanı içeren bütçe paketini Oval Ofis'te imzaladıktan sonra gündeme dair açıklamalarda bulundu. İran ile yürütülen müzakerelere ilişkin bir soruya yanıt veren Trump, müzakerelerin sürdüğünü belirterek, "Bir şeyler yapmak istiyorlar, bakalım somut bir sonuç çıkacak mı" dedi. "KENDİLERİYLE AKTİF OLARAK GÖRÜŞÜYORUZ" İran'ın nükleer tesislerini hedef alan "Gece Yarısı Çekici Operasyonu"nu hatırlatan Trump, "Daha önce bir fırsatları vardı ama işe yaramadı ve biz 'Midnight Hammer' Operasyonu'nu gerçekleştirdik. Bunun tekrar yaşanmasını istediklerini sanmıyorum. Müzakere etmek istiyorlar. Şu anda kendileriyle aktif olarak görüşüyoruz" şeklinde konuştu. Trump, müzakereler kapsamında planlanan toplantıların yeri ve zamanı konusunda detay vermekten kaçındı. İRAN, GÖRÜŞMELERİ NÜKLEER KONULARLA SINIRLAMAK İSTİYOR Axios haber platformunun ismini açıklamak istemeyen 2 yetkiliye dayandırdığı haberinde, İran'ın ABD ile yürütülecek müzakerelerin formatında ve mekanında değişiklik talep ettiği belirtildi. Haberde, İran'ın talebi üzerine 6 Şubat Cuma günü taraflar arasında İstanbul'da yapılacağı iddia edilen görüşmelerin Umman'a taşındığı, ABD'nin de bu...
creator: son dakika

title: Britische Royals: Prinzessin Kate mit gefühlvoller Botschaft am Weltkrebstag
content: Seit sie selbst mit Krebs diagnostiziert wurde, ist die Frau des britischen Thronfolgers Prinz William zur wichtigen Mutmacherin für Erkrankte geworden. Ihre Videobotschaften haben schon Tradition."Bitte, seid gewiss, dass ihr nicht alleine seid": Mit einer gefühlvollen Botschaft hat sich Prinzessin Kate (44) zum Weltkrebstag an Menschen mit Krebs gewandt. Die Frau des britischen Thronfolgers Prinz William (43) musste sich selbst einer Chemotherapie unterziehen, nachdem sie Anfang 2024 eine Krebsdiagnose erhalten hatte. Inzwischen ist die Behandlung abgeschlossen. Um welche Art von Krebs es sich handelte, ist nicht bekannt.Im Hintergrund ist Kates Stimme zu hörenIn einem rund 40-sekündigen Video, das auf den Social-Media-Auftritten des Thronfolger-Paares veröffentlicht wurde, ist sie beim Gespräch mit Patienten in einer Klinik zu sehen. Im Hintergrund ist Kates Stimme zu hören: "Krebs betrifft so viele Leben, nicht nur die der Patienten, sondern auch der Familien und Freunde und Pflegenden, die sie begleiten." Jeder, der diesen Weg kenne, wisse, dass er nicht geradlinig sei, so die Princess of Wales weiter. "Es gibt Momente der Furcht und Erschöpfung, aber auch Momente der Stärke, Güte und tiefer Verbundenheit. Der heutige Tag ist eine Erinnerung an die Bedeutung von Pflege, Verständnis und Hoffnung", sagt Kate. Die teils sehr persönlichen und hochwertig produzierten Videobotschaften von Prinzessin Kate haben inzwischen schon fast Tradition. Nach einer anfänglichen Phase der Zurückhaltung berichtete sie in mehreren Videobotschaften ungewöhnlich offen von ihrer Erkrankung. Sie zeigte sich dabei von ihrer verletzlichen Seite. "Die vergangenen neun Monate waren unglaublich hart für uns als Familie", sagte Kate in dem Video, bei dem sie das Ende ihrer Therapie verkündete. "Das Leben, wie man es kennt", könne sich "in einem einzigen Moment" verändern. Nur kurz vor seiner Schwiegertochter hatte auch König Charles III. (77) eine Krebserkrankung öffentlich gemacht. Er konnte Mitte Dezember vergangenen Jahres gute Nachrichten verkünden: Seine Behandlung hat gut angeschlagen und konnte inzwischen reduziert werden.

title: Policija traga za bivšom tužiteljkom Lidijom Mitrović, izbjegla odlazak u zatvor
content: [ An.B. ] Službenici Uprave policije preduzimaju mjere i radnje na pronalaženju i dovođenju osuđenog lica na izdržavanje kazne zatvora - bivše specijalne državne tužiteljke Lidije Mitrović, koja se nije dobrovoljno javila na izdržavanje kazne. "Naime, ona je prethodno uložila molbu nadležnom sudu za odlaganje izvršenja kazne zatvora, u čemu joj nije udovoljeno, kako smo obaviješteni od strane suda. Nadalje, službenici Odjeljenja bezbjednosti Podgorica su, postupajući po naredbi Osnovnog suda u Podgorici za prinudno dovođenje osuđene Lidije Mitrović, koja se nije dobrovoljno javila na izdržavanje kazne zatvora, u više navrata obišli lokaciju stanovanja i boravka ovoga lica gdje ista nije zatečena, i gdje su im od strane članova njene porodice saopštene različite oprečne informacije o boravku ovoga lica na teritoriji Podgorice ili Budve", saopšteno je iz UP. Dakle, policijski službenici su obišli sve navedene adrese, gdje ovo lice nije zatečeno, a o ishodu provjera je obaviješten nadležni sud. "Uzimajući u obzir da se Mitrović nije dobrovoljno javila na izdržavanje kazne zatvora, već da isto izbjegava, kako smo istakli, službenici Uprave policije su obavijestili nadležni sud o svim utvrđenim činjenicama, na osnovu čega je raspisana potjernica za ovim licem u cilju njenog pronalaženja i dovođenja na izdržavanje kazne zatvora. Službenici Uprave policije nastavljaju dalje aktivnosti na pronalasku ovoga lica pri čemu će aktivirati i druge zakonom dozvoljene mehanizme kako bi se osuđeno lice sprovelo na izdržavanje kazne zavora", kaže se u saopštenju.
creator: [ an.b. ]

title: 로제, 그래미 본상 수상 불발에도 웃었다...브루노 마스에 '볼뽀뽀' 퍼포먼스 "진짜 미친 일"
content: [마이데일리 = 김하영 기자] 그룹 블랙핑크 멤버 로제가 K팝 솔로 아티스트 최초 그래미 오프닝 무대를 장식한 소감을 전했다. 로제는 지난 3일 자신의 소셜미디어(SNS) 계정에 "그래미 시상식 오프닝 무대를 하다니 너무 재미있고 신났다. 정말 영광이고 꿈만 같다. 이건 진짜 진짜 진짜 말도 안 되게 대단하고 미친 일 같다"라는 글과 함께 영상 한 편을 게재했다. 공개된 영상에는 로제가 지난 1일(현지시간) 미국 로스앤젤레스에서 열린 '제68회 그래미 어워즈'에서 오프닝 공연을 펼치는 모습이 담겼다. 로제는 세계적인 팝스타 브루노 마스와 함께 '아파트'(Apt.) 무대를 꾸미며 시상식의 포문을 열었다. 특히 공연 초반 기타를 연주하던 브루노 마스와 가볍게 볼 인사를 나눈 뒤 그의 소개와 함께 인트로 파트를 맡아 무대를 경쾌하게 이끌며 뜨거운 환호를 받았다. 한편 로제는 이날 '아파트'로 그래미 본상인 '송 오브 더 이어'(올해의 노래), '레코드 오브 더 이어'(올해의 레코드)를 비롯해 '베스트 팝 듀오/그룹 퍼포먼스'까지 총 3개 부문 후보에 올랐으나 수상에는 아쉽게 이름을 올리지 못했다. 다만 본상 부문에서 K팝 가수가 후보로 지명된 것은 방탄소년단이 콜드플레이의 9집 앨범에 참여해 제65회 그래미 시상식 '앨범 오브 더 이어' 후보에 오른 사례 이후 두 번째다. 솔로 아티스트로서는 로제가 최초다. 또한 3개 부문 후보 지명은 당시 방탄소년단과 어깨를 나란히 하는 K팝 가수 최다 부문 기록이라는 점에서도 의미를 더했다. 이처럼 솔로 아티스트로서 새로운 이정표를 세운 로제는 다시 그룹 블랙핑크 멤버로 돌아와 활동을 이어간다. 블랙핑크는 오는 27일 오후 2시 미니 3집 '데드라인'(DEADLINE)을 발매하며 글로벌 팬들과 만날 예정이다. 김하영 기자 hakim0107@mydaily.co.kr - c마이데일리( www.mydaily.co.kr ). 무단전재&재배포 금지 -
creator: 김하영 기자

title: '전 국가대표' 손연재에게 운동 훈수 두는 남편...네티즌 "이 상황 뭐냐"
content: [마이데일리 = 한소희 기자] 전 리듬체조 국가대표 손연재가 남편과의 소소한 부부 일상을 공개하며 웃음을 안겼다. 4일 손연재의 유튜브 채널에는 "결혼 4년 차 부부의 흔한 티키타카"라는 제목의 쇼츠 영상이 올라왔다. 공개된 영상에는 자택에서 실내 자전거를 타며 홈트레이닝에 나선 손연재의 모습이 담겼다. 운동을 시작한 손연재는 다소 지친 표정으로 남편을 바라보며 "너무 하기 싫지만 약속을 해버렸다"고 솔직한 속내를 드러냈다. 이에 남편은 "15분 정도 탈 건데, 대신 힘들게 타야 한다"고 단호하게 말하며 운동 강도를 강조했다. 그러자 손연재는 "나는 여유 있게 타겠다"고 응수했고, 남편이 "그러면 운동이 안 된다"고 받아치자 "하는 게 어디냐"며 귀여운 투정을 부려 웃음을 자아냈다. 전직 국가대표 선수에게 운동 조언을 건네는 남편과 이를 유쾌하게 받아치는 손연재의 모습이 자연스러운 부부 케미를 보여줬다. 영상을 본 네티즌들은 "과감한 남편의 조언", "뭔가 역할이 뒤바뀐 느낌", "손연재도 남편 앞에서는 평범한 아내" 등의 반응을 남기며 훈훈한 분위기를 전했다. 한편, 손연재는 최근 둘째 임신을 준비하며 건강 관리를 위해 2kg 증량 계획을 세웠다고 밝혀 화제를 모은 바 있다. 그는 지난 2022년 9세 연상의 금융업 종사자와 결혼해 현재 슬하에 아들 한 명을 두고 있다. 한소희 기자 sohee0221@mydaily.co.kr - c마이데일리( www.mydaily.co.kr ). 무단전재&재배포 금지 -
creator: 한소희 기자

title: Մեր օրինակն ապացուցում է, որ խաղաղությունը հնարավոր է՝ չնայած երկարատեւ հակամարտությանը, երբ կա քաղաքական կամք
content: armtimes.com «Մենք ավելի քան 30 տարի պատերազմի մեջ էինք, հիմա արդեն 6 ամիս ապրում ենք խաղաղության մեջ»։ Այս մասին «Զայեդ» մարդկային եղբայրության մրցանակի հանձնման մրցանակաբաշխության ժամանակ ասաց Ադրբեջանի նախագահ Իլհամ Ալիեւը՝ երախտագիտություն հայտնելով Դատավորների կոմիտեին մրցանակի համար: «Մենք սովորում ենք ապրել խաղաղության մեջ: Դա հատուկ զգացողություն է: Մենք երբեք չենք ապրել խաղաղության մեջ անկախություն ձեռք բերելուց ի վեր։ Մենք արագ ենք սովորում։ Վաշինգտոնում կայացած պատմական գագաթնաժողովից հետո մենք շարժվում ենք տեւական եւ մշտական խաղաղության ուղղությամբ։ Այս 6 ամիսները շատ կարեւոր էին մեր հարաբերությունների զարգացման համար, սկսել ենք համագործակցել։ Մեր օրինակից պետք է դասեր առնել, որպես ճանապարհային քարտեզ ընդունել նրանց համար, ովքեր դեռ պատերազմում են։ Մեր օրինակը ապացուցում է, որ խաղաղությունը հնարավոր է՝ չնայած երկարատեւ հակամարտությանը, տառապանքին, փոխադարձ անվստահությանը։ Դա հնարավոր է, երբ կա ուժեղ քաղաքական կամք երկու կողմերի միջեւ, երբ այս գործընթացին աջակցում են բարեկամ երկրներն ու միջազգային հանրությունը»,- ասաց Ալիեւը: Նոյյան տապան - Ի՞նչ է գրում մամուլը Կարդացել են 169 անգամ

title: Զելենսկին չի ուզում խաղաղություն Ուկրաինայում. դա կնշանակի նրա կարիերայի ավարտը. Լավրով
content: tert.am Զելենսկին չի ուզում խաղաղություն Ուկրաինայում. դա կնշանակեր նրա կարիերայի ավարտ, այս մասին ասել է Լավրովը RT-ին տված հարցազրույցում։ «Խիղճը եւ Զելենսկին լավ չեն համադրվում. նա միայն իր գոյատեւման մասին է մտածում։ Եթե ուկրաինացիները Աբու Դաբի են ժամանել Ռադայում Ռյուտեի կողմից հնչեցված անվտանգության գաղափարներով, դա եւս մեկ անգամ ցույց կտա, որ Զելենսկին խաղաղություն չի ուզում»,-ասել է Լավրովը։ Նա ասել է, որ չգիտի, թե ինչ կառաջարկվի ռուսական պատվիրակությանը Աբու Դաբիում։ Նոյյան տապան - Ի՞նչ է գրում մամուլը Կարդացել են 176 անգամ

title: Winter: Unwetterwarnung vor Glatteis
content: Glatteis könnte in Berlin und Brandenburg zu erheblichen Problemen führen. Warum der Deutsche Wetterdienst von Fahrten und unnötigen Wegen dringend abrät und welche Orte betroffen sind.Für Teile Brandenburgs und Berlins hat der Deutsche Wetterdienst eine amtliche Unwetterwarnung vor Glatteis herausgegeben. Die Warnung, die auch über Warnapps wie Nina verbreitet wurde, gilt für Donnerstag von 02.00 Uhr bis 10.00 Uhr. Sie umfasst den Südosten und Osten Brandenburgs mit Cottbus, Frankfurt (Oder), Bernau und Oranienburg. In Berlin sind östliche Stadtteile betroffen. Bürgerinnen und Bürger werden aufgefordert, äußerst vorsichtig zu sein und den Aufenthalt im Freien sowie Fahrten mit dem Auto möglichst zu vermeiden. Auf allen Verkehrswegen seien Einschränkungen möglich. Es bestehe Gefahr für Leib und Leben.

title: Penas de hasta cuatro años de prisión para una banda de narcos búlgaros
content: Una banda de narcotraficantes -la mayoría de procedencia búlgara- reconoció haber introducido cocaína y cannabis en territorio nacional para luego distribuirla entre 2018 y 2020 en diferentes lugares, entre los que se encuentra la isla de Gran Canaria. Las penas a las que han sido condenado los siete encausados ya que uno de ellos estaba fuera del país, van desde el año y nueve meses a los cuatro años de cárcel tras el acuerdo de conformidad alcanzado por las defensas con el fiscal Antidroga de Las Palmas, Miguel Portell.En el juicio, celebrado por la Sección Sexta de la Audiencia provincial de Las Palmas, el magistrado presidente Emilio Moya Valdés dictaminó que Silvio Vittorio Sartor sería condenado por delitos contra la salud pública en su modalidad de sustancias que causan grave daño a la salud en cantidad de notoria importancia y por integración en grupo criminal. En conjunto, deberá cumplir cuatro años de prisión, además de una multa total de 50.000 euros.Por su parte, Sergey Todorov Costov, Noelia Giménez Cruz y Alexander Condes Santana han sido condenados igualmente por tráfico de drogas de notoria importancia e integración en grupo criminal. Cada uno de ellos afronta una pena total de dos años y tres meses de prisión y una multa de 25.000 euros.La resolución precisa que no se acuerda la expulsión de Alexander Condes Santana, pese a la petición formulada, al acreditarse su arraigo en España y tratarse de un ciudadano de la Unión Europea de nacionalidad búlgara, por lo que cumplirá íntegramente la pena privativa de libertad impuesta.Alberto Burillo Royo, que es de nacionalidad cubana, por su parte, ha sido condenado por un delito de tenencia ilícita de armas. La Sala le impuso una pena de un año y nueve meses de cárcel.Por último, Aleksandar Ivanov Barbosa y Plamen Naskinov fueron penados por tráfico de drogas de notoria importancia e integración en grupo criminal. Cada uno de ellos deberá cumplir una condena de tres años y nueve meses de prisión y el pago de una multa de 50.000 euros.Los hechos reconocidos por los ya condenados se remontan a 2019. Según el escrito de acusación del fiscal, Aleksandar Ivanov Barbosa y M.V.R. -que está fuera del país- tenían funciones de dirección y organizaban la obtención, introducción y transporte de la droga. En cambio, Silvio Vittorio Sartor se encargaba de esperar la sustancia estupefaciente a su llegada a Gran Canaria para luego distribuirla. Para las labores de...

title: Kollision mit Gegenverkehr: Kleintransporter kollidiert mit drei Autos – elf Verletzte
content: Ein Kleintransporter gerät bei Kelheim plötzlich auf die Gegenfahrbahn. Es kommt zur Kollision. Unter den Verletzten sind drei Kinder. Was die Polizei zum Unfallhergang sagt.Bei der Kollision eines Kleintransporters mit drei entgegenkommenden Autos bei Kelheim sind elf Menschen verletzt worden, einer davon schwer. Der Schwerverletzte sei in einem der Pkw gesessen, sagte ein Polizeisprecher. Unter den Leichtverletzten sind zudem drei Kinder. Der Fahrer des Transporters war nach Angaben der Polizei Richtung Ingolstadt unterwegs, als er aus noch unbekannten Gründen auf die Gegenfahrbahn geriet. Dort prallte sein Fahrzeug nacheinander mit den drei Autos zusammen. Die Bundesstraße 16 war in dem Bereich mehrere Stunden komplett gesperrt. Die Witterungsverhältnisse spielten laut Polizei keine Rolle.

Bei Entrümpelung entdeckte Frauenleiche: Tatverdacht gegen Lebensgefährten erhärtet
content: Im Fall einer bei einer Entrümpelung entdeckten Frauenleiche im nordrhein-westfälischen Monheim ist die Polizei bei der Aufklärung vorangekommen. Der Tatverdacht gegen den verstorbenen Wohnungsinhaber habe sich erhärtet, teilte die Kreispolizeibehörde Mettmann am Mittwoch mit. Durch einen DNA-Abgleich wurde die Frau als langjährige Lebensgefährtin des Mannes identifiziert.Die teils skelettierte Frauenleiche war Ende Januar bei Entrümpelungsarbeiten in der verwahrlosten Wohnung eines Mehrfamilienhauses entdeckt worden. Dort hatte sich der Wohnungsinhaber am 6. November 2025 während eines Polizeieinsatzes wegen des Verdachts eines Waffendeliktes mit einer Schusswaffe selbst lebensgefährlich verletzt. Der damals 52-Jährige war kurz darauf an den Folgen seiner Verletzungen gestorben. Seine Wohnung wurde von der Polizei versiegelt und erst Ende Januar für die Entrümpelung freigegeben.Die Frau war nicht als vermisst gemeldet, wie die Polizei nun weiter mitteilte. Auch hätten keinerlei Informationen über ihr Ableben bei den zuständigen Ämtern vor gelegen. Die Polizei habe Angehörige der Verstorbenen informiert und gehe davon aus, "dass sie Opfer eines Tötungsdeliktes geworden ist". Dies hätten erste Befunde im Rahmen der Obduktion durch die zuständige Rechtsmedizin ergeben.Wann die Frau zu Tode kam, ist weiter unklar. "Aufgrund von übereinstimmenden Zeugenhinweisen und den bisherigen Ermittlungsergebnissen" erhärtete demnach aber der Tatverdacht gegen den verstorbenen Wohnungsinhaber. Das Motiv für die Tat sei unklar.

title: Glätteunfall: A1 bei Stapelfeld nach Unfall mit Lastwagen wieder frei
content: Ein Sattelzug rutscht auf vereister Fahrbahn in die Leitplanke – die Polizei sperrt die A1 bei Stapelfeld. Ein Autofahrer wird leicht verletzt. Die Bergung des Lastwagens zieht sich.Nach stundenlanger Sperrung wegen eines Lastwagenunfalls ist die Autobahn 1 nordöstlich von Hamburg wieder freigegeben worden. Am Morgen hatte ein 53 Jahre alte Fahrer eines Sattelzugs zwischen Stapelfeld und Barsbüttel (Kreis Stormarn) auf glatter Fahrbahn die Kontrolle über sein Fahrzeug verloren und war auf ein Auto aufgefahren. Beide Fahrzeuge krachten in die Außenleitplanke, der Sattelzug durchbrach sie.Der 57 Jahre alte Autofahrer wurde leicht verletzt in ein Krankenhaus gebracht. Für die Rettungs- und Bergungsarbeiten war die Autobahn Richtung Hamburg voll gesperrt worden. Erst am frühen Abend konnte der Verkehr dort wieder rollen.

title: أسعار الدولار اليوم الأربعاء في مصر.. تحديثات السوق المصرفي
content: واصلت أسعار صرف الدولار الأمريكي ، إلى جانب عدد من العملات العربية والأجنبية الرئيسية، تراجعها أمام الجنيه المصري خلال تعاملات اليوم الأربعاء 4 فبراير 2026، داخل البنوك العاملة بالسوق المحلي وشركات الصرافة، وفقًا لآخر التحديثات الرسمية. وتراوح سعر الدولار الأمريكي في البنوك المصرية ما بين 46.82 و47.10 جنيه للشراء، بينما سجل سعر البيع نطاقًا بين 46.92 و47.20 جنيه، في ظل متابعة دقيقة من المستثمرين والمتعاملين بالسوق، نظرًا لتأثير تحركات الدولار المباشرة على أسعار السلع المستوردة وحركة التجارة الداخلية. ويُعد أداء الدولار مؤشرًا اقتصاديًا مهمًا يعكس اتجاهات السوق، حيث يؤثر بشكل مباشر على تكلفة الاستيراد والأسعار النهائية للمنتجات، ما يدفع المواطنين والمستثمرين إلى متابعة أسعاره بشكل يومي لاتخاذ قرارات مالية أكثر دقة. أسعار الدولار اليوم في أبرز البنوك: البنوك الحكومية: البنك الأهلي المصري: 46.90 جنيه للشراء – 47.00 جنيه للبيع بنك مصر: 46.90 جنيه للشراء – 47.00 جنيه للبيع البنك المركزي المصري: 46.94 جنيه للشراء – 47.04 جنيه للبيع البنوك الخاصة: البنك التجاري الدولي CIB: 46.88 جنيه للشراء – 46.98 جنيه للبيع ميد بنك: 46.96 جنيه للشراء – 47.06 جنيه للبيع بنك التعمير والإسكان: 46.87 جنيه للشراء – 46.97 جنيه للبيع بنك فيصل، العربي الأفريقي الدولي: 46.87 جنيه للشراء – 46.97 جنيه للبيع البنوك الخليجية والعالمية: أبوظبي الإسلامي، الكويت الوطني، بنك نكست: 46.98 جنيه للشراء – 47.08 جنيه للبيع أبوظبي الأول: 46.86 جنيه للشراء – 46.96 جنيه للبيع بنك قناة السويس: 46.92 جنيه للشراء – 47.02 جنيه للبيع بنك الإمارات دبي: 46.82 جنيه للشراء – 46.92 جنيه للبيع وسجل الدولار أعلى سعر في بنك القاهرة عند 47.10 جنيه للشراء و47.20 جنيه للبيع، بينما جاء أقل سعر في بنك الإمارات دبي . وعلى صعيد العملات الأخرى، شهد اليورو الأوروبي تحركات محدودة، حيث تراوح سعر الشراء بين 55.09 و55.77 جنيه، وسعر البيع بين 55.54 و56.05 جنيه، بما يعكس حالة من الاستقرار النسبي في سوق الصرف. وأكدت البيانات المصرفية أن تراجع الدولار يسهم في تعزيز قدرة الشركات والمستوردين على التخطيط المالي بشكل أفضل، ويدعم استقرار الأسعار داخل السوق المحلي. اقرأ أيضًا سعر الدولار في البنوك اليوم الجمعة 30 يناير 2026 (تحديث مسائي) سعر الدولار اليوم الجمعة 30 يناير 2026 في نهاية التعاملات أسعار الذهب في السعودية والعراق والكويت اليوم الجمعة 30 يناير 2026 تحديث نهاية التعاملات.. سعر اليورو مقابل الجنيه في البنوك اليوم

title: विदेशी राजस्थान फिरण्यासाठी आले खरे, पण भारताने केली हकालपट्टी; कारण काय?
content: अजमेर : राजस्थानमध्ये लाखो पर्यटक फिरण्यासाठी येत असतात. विदेशी पर्यटकांना राजस्थानातील राजे राजवाड्यांची, आलिशान महालांची भुरळ पडते, त्यामुळे हजारोंच्या संख्येने विदेशी पर्यटक राजस्थानला भेट देतात. असेच राजस्थान फिरण्यासाठी आलेल्या दोन विदेशी पर्यटकांना भारताने त्यांच्या देशात पिटाळले आहे. तर झालं असं राजस्थानच्या अजमेर जिल्ह्यातील पुष्कर येथे पॅलेन्स्टाईनच्या समर्थनार्थ आणि इस्त्रायलच्या विरोधात पोस्टर लावल्याने त्यांच्याविरोधात ही कठोर कारवाई करण्यात आली आहे. लुईस ग्रॅबियल डी ( ३६) आणि त्याची मैत्रीण एम्मा क्रिस्टीन ( ३६ ) हे दोघे राजस्थानात पर्यटनासाठी आले होते. यावेळी त्यांनी राजस्थानच्या अजमेर येथे वेगवेग्ळ्या जागांवर इस्त्रायल विरोधी आणि पॅलेन्स्टाईनच्या समर्थनार्थ पोस्टर चिटकवले. पोलिसांनी हे पोस्टर हटवले आहेत. स्थानिक पोलिसांनी तपास केला असता ब्रिटिश नागरिकांनी राजस्थानच्या पुष्कर येथे असे आक्षेपार्ह पोस्टर चिटकवले असल्याचे समजले. पुष्करमध्ये मोठ्या संख्येने इस्त्रायली पर्यटक हे येत असतात. आणि सध्या पुष्करमध्ये २००० इस्त्रायली पर्यटक आहेत, त्यामुळे जाणूनबुजून केलेल्या या कृती प्रकरणी भारताने इमिग्रेशन अँड फॉरेनर्स ऍक्ट २०२५ नुसार गुन्हा दाखल करून पोस्टर चिकटवणाऱ्या दोघांवर कारवाई केली आहे. अजमेरच्या गुन्हे अन्वेषण विभागाचे पोलीस अधीक्षक यांनी ही माहिती दिली. व्हिसा नियमांनुसार भारतीय भूमीवर असताना इतर राष्ट्रांचा अनादर करण्याच्या कृतींमध्ये सहभागी होणे, हे व्हिसा नियमांचे स्पष्ट उल्लंघन आहे. यामुळेच ब्रिटिश नागरिकांवर कारवाई करण्यात आली आहे.

title: ZTO Prices Offering of US$1.5 Billion Convertible Senior Notes
content: SHANGHAI , Feb. 4, 2026 /PRNewswire/ -- ZTO Express (Cayman) Inc. (NYSE: ZTO and SEHK: 2057) , a leading and fast-growing express delivery company in China ("ZTO" or the "Company"), today announced the pricing of US$1.5 billion in aggregate principal amount of convertible senior notes due 2031 (the "Notes"). The Notes have been offered in offshore transactions outside the United States to non-U.S. persons that are "qualified institutional buyers" (as defined in Rule 144A under the United States Securities Act of 1933, as amended (the "Securities Act")) in reliance on Regulation S under the Securities Act. The Company plans to use the net proceeds from the Notes Offering for the following purposes: (i) up to US$1,000 million for refinancing to fund near-term on-market repurchases (from time to time) of Class A ordinary shares and/or American depositary shares ("ADSs") of the Company pursuant to its share repurchase program(s), subject to prevailing market conditions, as well as applicable laws and regulations, (ii) approximately US$500 million to fund the Concurrent Share Repurchase (as defined below), the premium of the capped call transactions as described below and other general corporate purposes. When issued, the Notes will be general senior unsecured obligations of ZTO. The Notes will bear interest at a rate of 0.925% per year, payable semiannually in arrears on March 1 and September 1 of each year, beginning on September 1, 2026. The Notes will mature on March 1, 2031, unless earlier redeemed, repurchased or converted in accordance with their terms prior to such date. The initial conversion rate of the Notes is 32.3130 of the Company's Class A ordinary shares per US$1,000 principal amount of Notes (which is equivalent to an initial conversion price of approximately HK$241.79 per Class A ordinary share and represents a conversion premium of approximately 35.0% above the closing price of the Company's Class A ordinary shares on February 4, 2026, which was HK$179.10 per Class A ordinary shares). The conversion rate for the Notes is subject to adjustment upon the occurrence of certain events. Holders may not convert the Notes at any time prior to the 40th day following the last date of the original issuance of the Notes (such date, the "Compliance Period End Date"). After the Compliance Period End Date, holders may convert their Notes at their option at any time prior to the close of business on the fifth scheduled trading day immediately preceding the...

title: 영덕·울진·울릉군 선거 '공천잡기 총력전'
content: 김광일, 조주홍, 이희진(왼쪽부터). 자료사진 영덕과 울진, 울릉군수 선거는 모두 보수정당 국민의힘 소속 후보군이 일찌감치 선거전에 뛰어들었다. 영덕은 국민의힘 김광열 군수의 재선 도전이 확실시되는 가운데 같은 당 이희진 전 군수와 조주홍 전 경북도의원이 경선 경쟁자로 거론되고 있다. 김광열 군수는 재임 중 발생한 초대형 산불이라는 재난 속에서도 비교적 신속한 대응과 피해 복구에 나서며 군민 신뢰를 쌓았다고 평가받고 있다. 도전자 가운데는 조주홍 전 도의원이 가장 먼저 출마를 공식화했다. 지난달 19일 출마 선언을 한 조주홍 전 도의원은 지역의 변화와 성공을 강조하며 선거전에 뛰어들었다. 국회 부의장 비서관, 광역 의정 경험 등을 강점으로 스마트 수산단지, 원전 등 지역 성장 비전을 제시했다. 이희진 전 군수는 공식 출마 선언은 하지 않았지만 8년간의 군정 경험을 앞세워 주민들과의 만남을 이어가고 있다. 재임 당시 군정 성과와 소통을 강조하며 바닥 민심을 모으고 있다. 장성욱, 박병일, 강부송(왼쪽부터). 자료사진 이와 함께 군수 선거에 출마한 경험이 있는 장성욱 전 문경부시장과 박병일 언론인도 자천타천으로 거론된다. 여당인 더불어민주당은 강부송 농어민위원회 부위원장 등의 이름이 나온다. 손병복, 전찬걸, 임승필(왼쪽부터). 자료사진 울진군수 선거는 국민의힘 경선과 무소속 바람이 최대 변수이다. 국민의힘 소속 손병복 군수와 전찬걸 전 군수, 임승필 울진군의원 등이 경선대결을 펼친다. 여기에 지난 군수 선거에서 무소속으로 나와 높은 득표를 기록했던 황이주 전 경북도의원과 김창수 전 울진군 자치행정국장, 장종철 법무사가 울진군수에 도전한다. 황이주, 김창수, 장종철(왼쪽부터). 자료사진 전·현직 군수의 리턴매치, 임 군의원의 새로운 도전장까지 국민의힘 경선 향방에 관심이 뜨겁다. 월등히 앞서는 후보가 없어 섣불리 경선 결과를 title: الأمن يضبط مسؤولين عن مصحة غير مرخصة بالجيزة بعد هروب نزلاء قبل مداهمة أمنية
content: في إطار جهود أجهزة الأمن لكشف ملابسات مقطع الفيديو الذي تم تداوله عبر مواقع التواصل الاجتماعي، والذي أظهر هروب عدد من نزلاء مصحة غير مرخصة بمحافظة الجيزة، تمكنت مديرية أمن الجيزة من تحديد هوية المتورطين في الواقعة. بالفحص والتحقيقات، تبين أنه بتاريخ 2 من الشهر الجاري، وأثناء مرور قوة أمنية من مديرية أمن الجيزة برفقة الجهات المعنية في نطاق مركز شرطة أبو النمرس لفحص الشقق والفيلات التي يتم استخدامها كمصحات لعلاج الإدمان بدون ترخيص، قام المسؤولون عن إحدى المصحات غير المرخصة بصرف النزلاء منها قبل وصول القوات الأمنية لمداهمة المكان. وعلى إثر ذلك، تم ضبط 4 أشخاص وهم: مالك الفيلا وثلاثة مشرفين في المصحة. وبمواجهتهم، اعترفوا بارتكاب الواقعة وبتصرفاتهم التي أدت إلى هروب النزلاء. تم اتخاذ الإجراءات القانونية اللازمة، وتواصل الأجهزة الأمنية التحقيقات في الواقعة.

title: Newell's have dream plan to lure Messi in 2027
content: Newell's Old Boys are working on a project to entice Lionel Messi to play for the club in the first half of 2027. The initiative was confirmed by the Argentinian club's first vice president, Juan Manuel Medina, who said: "It's a project that goes beyond Newell's. It involves the city of Rosario, the province, and Argentine football." Messi, who played for Newell's youth teams until he moved to Barcelona at the age of 13, signed a contract extension in October to remain at Inter Miami through the end of the 2028 campaign. The idea of considering Messi as a long-term strategic target began to take shape in 2024. Newell's plan is to build a comprehensive framework that includes the political, social and sporting spheres, to convince Messi to make a return that has an impact that goes beyond the field. The plan would include improving the club's infrastructure, bringing a competitive sporting environment and having the institutional conditions befitting a figure of global impact. Reports claim that informal talks have already taken place with Messi's inner circle, although without any concrete progress or firm decisions. - Who has the most Champions League goals, assists all time? - Lionel Messi prefers ownership over coaching after career Messi, 38, joined Inter Miami in July 2023 and has been a central figure for the club. He captained Miami to their first ever trophies -- the Leagues Cup in 2023, the Supporters' Shield in 2024 and the MLS Cup last season. Messi, who is expected to captain Argentina at the World Cup in the summer, has not given an indication as to when he will retire from football. Newell's believe that returning to the club would be the ideal end to the 2022 World Cup winner's career.
creator: adriana garcia

title: General : GoGiggers Programme Paves Way To Financial Dignity For Sabah Gig Workers
content: KOTA KINABALU, Feb 4 (Bernama) -- The GoGiggers Financial Literacy Programme 2025: Jelajah Borneo - Sabah leg has recorded significant improvements in financial discipline and social protection among gig workers in the state, with 98 per cent of participants now registered as members of the Employees Provident Fund (EPF). The programme, organised by the Credit Counselling and Debt Management Agency (AKPK) in collaboration with foodpanda and supported by Bank Simpanan Nasional (BSN) and EPF, concluded with a closing ceremony here today involving 89 delivery partners, also known as ‘Rakan Riders’. Acting AKPK Chief Executive Officer Azman Hasim said the initiative supported the Hala Tuju Sabah Maju Jaya (SMJ) roadmap, particularly its second pillar on human capital development and people’s well-being. He said gig workers played a vital role in Sabah’s modern economy and must be equipped with strong financial literacy to build long-term resilience. "At the highest levels of AKPK, our mission is clear - we are here to ensure that no Malaysian is left defenceless against economic volatility,” he said in his closing address. Azman said the Sabah cohort had emerged as a national benchmark for the gig economy, citing the near-universal EPF registration rate as a milestone in formalising social protection for delivery partners. He added that the collective savings of the Borneo cohort (Sabah and Sarawak) increased by 379 per cent over six months, rising from RM9,990 to RM47,879, with average savings exceeding RM500 per rider. “In Sabah specifically, the dedicated use of the AKPK Ringgit Diary led to over RM21,000 in tracked savings,” he said. Azman said a survey conducted last month showed participants recorded a 20 per cent improvement in overall financial well-being and a 26 per cent increase in financial resilience, reflecting stronger preparedness for unexpected expenses. He said the collaboration with EPF had helped dispel the perception that gig work was unprotected by enabling delivery partners to participate in formal social security schemes, thereby reducing the risk of old-age poverty. The programme also recognised top achievers, with six Sabah delivery partners each saving more than RM1,000 during the programme period, highlighting consistent savings habits despite the demands of gig work. Azman said AKPK reaffirmed its commitment to strengthening national financial resilience through financial education, advisory services and structured tools, in line...

title: Trump to 'draw down' 700 immigration agents in Minnesota
content: U.S. President Donald Trump's administration will reduce the number of federal immigration enforcement agents in Minnesota by 700, although about 2,000 agents will remain on the ground, White House border czar Tom Homan announced on Wednesday.Trump has deployed thousands of armed immigration enforcement agents in and around Minneapolis this year to detain and deport migrants, drawing protests.Homan said he was partially drawing down the deployment because he was seeing "unprecedented" cooperation from Minnesota's elected sheriffs who run county jails."Let me be clear, President Trump fully intends to achieve mass deportations during this administration, and immigration enforcement actions will continue every day throughout this country," Homan said at a news conference. "President Trump made a promise. And we have not directed otherwise."Trump, a Republican, and his senior officials have said many migrants must be deported, blaming them, often in sweeping terms, for financial fraud and violent crimes.Minnesota, which is governed by Democrats, has sued the Trump administration over the surge, which has sparked weeks of protests that led to the killings of two U.S. citizens by federal agents.Homan wants more jails in Minnesota to allow immigration agents to transfer custody of detained migrants. Some already do. Others, including the main jail in Minneapolis, do not cooperate. Minneapolis and some other cities prohibit their employees, including police, from asking people about their citizenship or cooperating with federal immigration enforcement, saying it threatens public safety if migrants who are victims of or witnesses t

title: Love bamboo shoots? You'll enjoy these recipes
content: Bamboo shoots are a versatile ingredient, used in several cuisines around the world. They add a unique texture and flavor to dishes, making them a favorite among food enthusiasts. Here are five delightful recipes that highlight the natural goodness of bamboo shoots. From savory stir-fries to refreshing salads, these dishes are sure to please anyone looking to explore the culinary potential of this ingredient. Bamboo shoot stir-fry is a quick and easy way to enjoy the natural crunch of bamboo shoots. Start by slicing fresh bamboo shoots thinly and sauteing them with bell peppers, carrots, and snow peas in a hot pan. Add soy sauce, garlic, and ginger for flavor. Cook until the vegetables are tender yet crisp. This dish goes well with steamed rice or noodles. A bamboo shoot salad is perfect for those who love light and refreshing meals. Combine sliced bamboo shoots with cucumbers, cherry tomatoes, and lettuce leaves. Drizzle the salad with sesame dressing made from sesame oil, soy sauce, lemon juice, and honey. Toss gently to coat all ingredients evenly. This salad makes an excellent side dish or a light lunch option. For a comforting bowl of soup infused with the earthy flavor of bamboo shoots, try making creamy bamboo shoot soup. Start by sauteing onions and garlic in olive oil until fragrant. Add chopped bamboo shoots along with vegetable broth and let it simmer until soft. Blend the mixture until smooth before adding cream for richness. Season with salt and pepper to taste before serving hot. Spicy bamboo shoot curry brings warmth through spices like cumin seeds, coriander powder, turmeric powder, chili powder, and garam masala, combined with tender pieces of bamboo shoot simmered in coconut milk-based gravy. Serve over basmati rice or with flatbreads like naan or roti, enhancing the overall experience by balancing the heat from the spices beautifully. Grilled bamboo shoot skewers provide an interesting twist to regular barbecue fare. Marinate whole peeled shoots in a mixture of olive oil, lemon juice, herbs, and spices for a few hours. Thread them onto skewers and grill until charred and tender. Serve these skewers as appetizers or part of a larger spread at your next gathering, impressing guests with the unique flavors and textures they bring to the table.
creator: pallabi chatterjee

title: Beetroot v/s carrot: Which has better benefits?
content: Beetroot and carrot are two of the most popular root vegetables, both of which are known for their health benefits. While both are packed with essential nutrients, they differ in terms of nutritional profiles and health benefits. This article delves into the nutritional differences between beetroot and carrot, and how they can benefit your diet. By knowing these differences, you can make informed choices about including these vegetables in your meals. Beetroots are also a great source of vitamin C, which is important for immune function and skin health. Carrots are famous for their high vitamin A content, which is important for vision and skin health. While both vegetables provide different vitamins, including them in your diet can ensure you get a variety of nutrients. Fiber is essential for digestive health, and both beetroot and carrot provide a good amount of it. Carrots have a slightly higher fiber content than beetroots, which helps in digestion and keeps you full. However, beetroots also provide soluble fiber that can help lower cholesterol levels and improve heart health. Antioxidants are important for fighting oxidative stress in the body. Carrots are loaded with beta-carotene, an antioxidant that converts to vitamin A in the body. Beetroots have betalains, which have anti-inflammatory properties. Adding both vegetables to your diet can give you a range of antioxidants for overall health. Both beetroot and carrot provide essential minerals such as potassium and magnesium. Potassium is important for heart health as it regulates blood pressure levels. Magnesium supports muscle function and bone health. Including these root vegetables in your diet can help meet your daily mineral requirements without adding too many calories.
creator: pallabi chatterjee

title: What roles do siblings play in weddings across the world?
content: From being ring bearers to giving emotional support, siblings have always played an important role in weddings across cultures. Their presence is often a source of joy and comfort, making the day even more special for the couple. From being part of the ceremony to leading the celebrations, siblings take on many roles that are unique to every family and tradition. Here are five memorable roles siblings have played in weddings across cultures. In many Western weddings, a sibling often takes on the important role of the ring bearer. This tradition sees them carrying wedding bands down the aisle, symbolizing trust and responsibility. It is usually a role given to younger brothers or sisters who are excited to be part of such an important moment. Their innocent enthusiasm often brings a light-hearted touch to the ceremony. In several cultures, siblings are chosen as the maid or man of honor. This role goes beyond just standing next to the couple; it includes planning pre-wedding events and supporting them through emotional ups and downs. Being a sibling makes this role even more special, as they share a bond that goes beyond friendship. In some cultures, siblings play the role of cultural guardians during weddings by performing traditional rituals or wearing cultural attire that honors family heritage. This responsibility ensures that customs are respected and passed down through generations. It is a way for siblings to connect with their roots while making new memories with their family. On wedding days, when emotions run high, siblings often become emotional anchors for both brides and grooms. They provide comfort during stressful moments and share in joyful celebrations with genuine happiness. Their understanding nature helps keep things calm when needed most. Often, siblings are the ones who take the dance floor by storm, leading the charge with the most energetic moves, and getting everyone to join in. Their carefree spirit and willingness to let go of everything else, if only for a moment, brings everyone together, creating memories that last a lifetime. This role is a reminder of the bond they share, one that makes the day even more special for everyone involved.
creator: pallabi chatterjee

title: Does outdoor yoga boost flexibility more than garden calisthenics?
content: Outdoor yoga and garden calisthenics are two popular exercises that promise to improve flexibility. Both activities can be done outdoors, giving you the opportunity to connect with nature while working on your body. While outdoor yoga focuses on stretching and breathing, garden calisthenics include bodyweight exercises that promote mobility and strength. Here's a look at how each activity helps improve flexibility. Outdoor yoga is all about stretching your muscles and joints through various poses. The natural surroundings can help you relax, which is important for your muscles to stretch properly. The focus on breathing in yoga helps increase oxygen flow to your muscles, which can improve their elasticity over time. Practicing regularly can lead to better posture and reduced tension in the body. Garden calisthenics involve dynamic movements that target multiple muscle groups at once. These exercises usually involve movements like lunges, squats, and arm circles that require full-body engagement. The dynamic nature of calisthenics helps in improving range of motion in joints while building strength. This combination makes it an effective way to enhance overall flexibility. The intensity level of outdoor yoga can vary from gentle stretches to more vigorous flows, depending on the practitioner's experience level and goals. Beginners may start with basic poses aimed at improving balance and stability, while advanced practitioners may attempt complex asanas requiring greater flexibility. Garden calisthenics usually involve higher intensity due to the fast-paced nature of the exercises, making it suitable for those seeking a more vigorous workout. When choosing between outdoor yoga or garden calisthenics for flexibility improvement, consider your personal fitness goals. If you want a calming exercise routine with an emphasis on breathing techniques, outdoor yoga would be apt. If you want a full-body workout with an emphasis on mobility and strength, garden calisthenics would be the way to go.
creator: pallabi chatterjee

title: T20 WC warm-ups: Ishan Kishan smashes half-century against SA
content: India went in with Ishan Kishan as the second opener, along with Abhishek Sharma, for their 2026 ICC T20 World Cup warm-up match against South Africa. Skipper Suryakumar Yadav named Kishan the opener after winning the toss at DY Patil Stadium. And the latter, who replaced the out-of-form Sanju Samson, immediately made a mark with a blistering half-century. Kishan, who took strike, smacked 2 sixes in the first over itself, off Lungi Ngidi. He came out all guns blazing, having smacked Anrich Nortje for 3 sixes thereafter. In the sixth over, the left-handed dasher reached his 23-ball half-century with another maximum off Kwena Maphaka. However, skipper Suryakumar called him back right after this to give others game time. Kishan retired out for a 20-ball 53 (2 fours and 7 sixes). Once a promising talent in India's cricketing circuit, Kishan fell out of favor with the national team in late 2023 after taking a break. However, his stellar form in domestic cricket helped him make an incredible comeback. He was named as the backup wicketkeeper-batter for the T20 World Cup and returned to the squad for the recent New Zealand series after Tilak Varma's injury. Kishan made the most of his second chance, scoring 215 runs from four matches against New Zealand at a strike rate of 231.20 at No. 3. This included a match-winning century in the last T20I in Thiruvananthapuram. Meanwhile, Samson struggled for form, scoring 46 runs across five innings with a strike rate of 135.30. Therefore, India picked Kishan as their opener for the warm-up match, suggesting a shift in their strategy. India's 2026 T20 World Cup campaign will start on February 7 with a match against the USA. The team is high on confidence after a 4-1 series win over New Zealand at home. The warm-up match against SA was their final preparation for the tournament.
creator: parth dhall

title: Tilak Varma shines versus South Africa in T20 WC warm-up
content: Indian batter Tilak Varma shone for his side against South Africa in a warm-up contest ahead of the upcoming ICC T20 World Cup 2026, starting February 7. Varma, who recently has returned from injury, showed his mettle for the 2nd warm-up game running. After scoring 38 runs for India A in a warm-up clash against the USA, Varma managed a 19-ball 45 versus SA. India were off to flier against the Proteas. Ishan Kishan led the charge with a 20-ball 53. He was retired out with India's score reading 80/1. Varma came into the crease thereafter. He added 22 runs alongside Abhishek Sharma before piling on 44 runs with skipper Suryakumar Yadav. The southpaw perished in the 11th over with India being 146/3. Marco Jansen dismissed Varma. Varma's 19-ball 45 was laced with three fours and three sixes. He struck at 236.84. He was finally castled behind his legs. Jansen's yorker did the trick as an attempted flick saw Varma miss connection. In the warm-up clash versus USA, Varma scored a neat 38 runs from 24 balls. He smashed three fours and two sixes. He batted in his usual positon at number three and added 113 runs for the 2nd wicket alongside N Jagadeesan.
creator: rajdeep saha

title: Aaron George hammers century as India reach U19 WC final
content: Aaron George shone for the India with a blistering century in the ICC U19 Cricket World Cup semi-final clash against Afghanistan on Wednesday. The match at Harare Sports Club, Harare, saw India chase down a target of 311 in just 41.1. overs. George led the way with a knock of 115 from 104 balls as India claimed a seven-wicket win. Here's more. Vaibhav Suryavanshi scored a rapid 33-ball 68 as India were off to a flier against the Afghans. Alongside George, Suryavanshi added 90 runs inside 10 overs before perishing. Thereafter, Ayush Mhatre arrived at the crease and was part of a 114-run stand with George. India were 204/2 when Mhatre departed for 62. George then added 94 runs alongside Vihaan Malhotra before perishing. George's knock of 115 from 104 balls was laced with 15 fours and two sixes. He owned a strike rate of 110.58. In the ongoing U19 World Cup, George has now raced to 161 runs from four matches at an average of 40.25 (100s: 1). As per ESPNcricinfo, he is now the 18th different batter to hit a century in this edition's U19 WC. George is now the 2nd Indian batter to slam a century in the 2026 U19 World Cup. Earlier, Vihaan Malhotra slammed an unbeaten score worth 109 versus Zimbabwe.
creator: rajdeep saha

title: Stiff neck? These home remedies might help
content: Neck stiffness can be a real pain, making it difficult to move and causing discomfort. Luckily, there are several home remedies that can help relieve mild neck stiffness. These natural methods are easy to follow and can be done without any special equipment or cost. By incorporating these remedies into your routine, you may find relief from neck stiffness without having to visit a doctor. Applying a warm compress to the stiff area can relax muscles and improve blood circulation. You can use a warm towel or heating pad for this purpose. Apply the compress for about 15 minutes at a time, ensuring it is not too hot to avoid skin irritation. This method is particularly effective after long hours of sitting or working at a desk. Gentle stretching exercises can help relieve tension in the neck muscles. Simple movements like tilting your head side to side or forward and backward can be beneficial. Perform these stretches slowly and avoid any sudden movements that may worsen the stiffness. Regular stretching throughout the day can gradually improve flexibility and reduce discomfort. Massage is another effective way to relieve neck stiffness by targeting tight muscles directly. Use your fingertips to apply gentle pressure on the affected areas in circular motions. You may also consider using essential oils like lavender or peppermint oil for added relaxation benefits during the massage session. Your sleep position plays a key role in neck health. Make sure your pillow supports your head and neck properly, keeping them aligned with your spine. Avoid sleeping on your stomach as it may strain your neck further. A supportive pillow designed for neck alignment can make a world of difference in preventing stiffness. Staying hydrated and eating a balanced diet rich in vitamins and minerals are key to muscle health and avoiding stiffness. Drink enough water throughout the day, and include foods high in magnesium (like nuts and leafy greens) in your diet. These nutrients help keep muscles healthy and prevent cramps/stiffness from occurring frequently.
creator: pallabi chatterjee

title: Outdoor yoga or cycling: Which uplifts your mood?
content: Outdoor activities are a great way to boost your mood, and yoga and cycling are two of the most popular choices. Both activities have their own benefits and can help you feel better, but in different ways. While cycling is all about cardio, yoga emphasizes relaxation and flexibility. Knowing how these activities affect your mood can help you choose the right one for you. Yoga is known for its calming effect on the mind and body. The practice involves deep breathing and meditation, which can reduce stress levels significantly. Studies have shown that regular yoga practice can lead to a decrease in anxiety and depression symptoms by up to 50%. The gentle movements of yoga also promote relaxation, making it an ideal choice for those looking to unwind. Cycling is an excellent way to get an adrenaline rush, which can enhance your mood instantly. The aerobic exercise increases endorphin levels in the body, leading to what is popularly known as the runner's high. This natural high can improve your mood within minutes of starting your ride. Cycling outdoors also exposes you to fresh air and nature, further boosting your mental well-being. Both yoga classes and cycling groups offer opportunities for social interaction, which can significantly enhance mood. Participating in group activities fosters a sense of community and belonging, reducing feelings of loneliness or isolation. Engaging with others who share similar interests can lead to new friendships and support networks, contributing positively to emotional health. Yoga focuses on flexibility and balance, which are important for overall physical health and injury prevention. Improved flexibility can lead to better posture and reduced muscle tension over time. On the other hand, cycling builds endurance and cardiovascular health. Regular cycling sessions improve heart function and increase stamina, making it a great choice for those looking to enhance their physical fitness levels.
creator: pallabi chatterjee

title: Badshah makes history as first Indian Rapper to play at NBA All-Star Celebrity Game 2026
content: Indian hip-hop star Badshah is set to achieve a major international milestone as he becomes the first-ever Indian rapper to participate in the Ruffles NBA All-Star Celebrity Game. The high-profile event will take place on February 13, 2026, at the Kia Forum in Inglewood, California, and will be broadcast exclusively on ESPN as part of the NBA All-Star Weekend celebrations. Marking his debut at the globally followed fan-favourite game, Badshah will represent India on an international sporting stage, joining a diverse roster of celebrities spanning music, film, television, and professional sports. Known for his larger-than-life persona and cross-cultural appeal, the rapper is expected to bring his signature energy to both the court and the surrounding festivities. Badshah’s appearance at the NBA All-Star Celebrity Game caps off an eventful period in his career. Over the past year, he has expanded his global footprint by becoming the first rapper worldwide to co-create a Maybach Eyewear range and the first Asian rapper to announce a headline show at London’s The O2. He also led one of the largest Indian hip-hop tours across North America, attended Paris and New York Fashion Weeks, collaborated with international artists such as Davido, and launched his own pizza and vodka brands. Speaking about the opportunity, Badshah said, "I'm beyond excited to be part of this incredible event and take Indian hip hop center court during NBA All-Star Weekend. Basketball has always been one of my biggest passions, and playing on the same court as legends from the NBA, NFL, Hollywood and music is truly an honour. The NBA represents a powerful mix of sport, culture and self-expression, and as basketball's fan base continues to grow in India, it's exciting to represent that energy on a global stage. I can't wait to bring my energy, my game and some unforgettable moments for fans around the world!" The 2026 Celebrity Game line-up includes well-known entertainment and sports personalities such as actor and comedian Keegan-Michael Key, rapper GloRilla, producer DJ Mustard, actor Simu Liu, Emmy-winning actor Rome Flynn, Chinese star Dylan Wang, and Olympic medallist Andre De Grasse, among others. Former NBA players and sports figures will also feature prominently, adding to the event’s crossover appeal. Adding to the spectacle, the game will feature a halftime performance by K-pop group CORTIS and return segments such as the Green Carpet presentation and fan-favourite in-game...

title: Woman injured after gas-filled bundle of balloons exploded inside lift in Mumbai
content: A woman was injured after a gas-filled bundle of balloons exploded inside a lift of a building in Mumbai`s Goregaon, officials said on Wednesday, adding the the police has launched a probe into the matter.According to the police, the incident took place on February 2, 2026, at around 10:30 pm.The complainant, 21-year-old student Himani Gagan Tapariya, from Surat in Gujarat, told the police that she entered the lift on the ground floor of Anmol Tower, located opposite Patel Petrol Pump on S.V. Road.Moments later, an unknown man entered the lift carrying 10 to 12 air-filled balloons. Suddenly, the balloons exploded, causing serious injuries to Himani’s right hand, neck, and abdomen.The Goregaon Police have registered a case under Section 125(b) of the Bharatiya Nyaya Sanhita (BNS) after woman was left seriously injured when the balloons exploded.Negligence allegedPolice said the man handling the balloons, later identified as Raju Kumar Mahto (32) of Andheri West, was not provided with any safety equipment. The explosion appears to have been caused by negligence and careless conduct, leading to legal action based on the complainant’s statement.The balloons were allegedly ordered by Arpit Jain, a resident of Room No. 1003, Anmol Tower, Goregaon West.Probe underwayPolice said further investigation is underway to determine the exact cause of the explosion and the responsibilities of those involved.

Sources: McCabe, Mead facing uncertain Arsenal futures
content: is likely to leave in the summer upon the expiry of her contract, and future is also undecided, sources have told ESPN. Arsenal are preparing for an overhaul in the summer, with several long-serving players expected to not be offered new contracts and exit on free transfer in the summer. The club are hoping to reduce the overall age and refresh the squad. McCabe joined Arsenal in 2015 and has made over 250 appearances for the side in all competitions. The left-back is likely to leave on a free transfer at the end of her contract, with the club keen to agree a pre-contract agreement with Spanish defender , sources told ESPN. Clubs in the have been interested in McCabe for some time, sources said. As a long-standing fan favourite, clubs are keen to capitalise on her ability to increase global audiences. Mead's future is also undetermined, with the Lionesses also facing a possible exit upon the expiry of her contract in the summer. Mead has been at the club since 2017 and has become one of Arsenal's most key players. The winger assisted Stina Blackstenius' Champions League winning goal in the summer. Mead was close to a move away from the club last summer, with making an offer for the 30-year-old that fell through, with Mead opting to remain at Arsenal. As well as Batlle, Arsenal are targeting Lioness and are keen to bring her in on a free transfer in the summer. The midfielder announced she would leave current club at the end of her contract. Arsenal are likely to face more than just two exits this summer. Caitin Foord and are also in the last six-months of their contracts, so are and , but the latter duo have struggled for minutes this season. and have both had positive negotiations with the club about extending their stays. Sources acknowledged a refresh is needed, though departures are depending on the ability to bring in new players.

title: הגזרה מתחממת: צה"ל חיסל בכיר בג'יהאד האסלאמי | דיווח
content: צה"ל מאשר: חוסל מפקד חטיבת צפון בג'יהאד האסלאמי אמיר בוחבוט עודכן לאחרונה: 4.2.2026 / 20:20 עלי אל-רזאינה, מפקד החטיבה הצפונית של ארגון הטרור הוא הבכיר עליו דווח מוקדם יותר. הוא היה אחראי על החזקת חטופים ועל התיאום בין הג'יהאד האסלאמי לחמאס. התקיפה מגיעה ברקע פציעתו הקשה של קצין מילואים בצפון רצועת עזה הלילה שתף ב וואצאפ שתף ב פייסבוק שתף ב טוויטר שתף ב אימאייל שתף ב general חיסול מפקד חטיבת צפון הרצועה בגא"פ / דובר צה"ל מפקד החטיבה הצפונית בזרוע הצבאית של הג'יהאד האסלאמי, עלי אל-רזאינה, חוסל היום (רביעי) בהפצצות צה"ל בדיר אל-בלח, במרכז רצועת עזה - כך אישר צה"ל. במסגרת תפקידו של רזאינה, הוא היה אחראי על פריסת מחבלי ארגון הטרור ותכנית ההגנה של חטיבת צפון הרצועה בג'יהאד והשתתף במועצה הצבאית של הארגון. עוד היה אמון על התיאום בין הארגון לחמאס. לאורך המלחמה, רזיאנה פיקד על החזקת החטופים בשבי על ידי הג'יהאד האיסלאמי בצפון רצועת עזה ומאז כניסת הסכם הפסקת האש לתוקף, המחבל פעל לשיקום חטיבת צפון הרצועה. התקיפה מגיעה ברקע פציעתו הקשה של קצין מילואים בצפון רצועת עזה הלילה. הלוחם נפצע באורח קשה מירי מחבלים בקו הצהוב, ופונה לבית החולים. עוד דווח היום כי במסגרת פעילות כוחות צה"ל באזור ג'באליה שבצפון רצועת עזה, נחשף בעקבות פעילות רחפנים שגרתית במרחב הקו הצהוב, כיצד מחבלי חמאס חמושים משתמשים באופן חזרתי ושיטתי באמבולנסים על מנת לבצע העברות פעילים ונשק מתוך בית חולים אל בית ספר. מפקד החטיבה הצפונית בזרוע הצבאית של הג'יהאד האסלאמי, עלי אל-רזאינה / דובר צה"ל החיכוך גבר בתקופה האחרונה גבר החיכוך בין כוחות צה"ל לאורך הקו הצהוב לבין חוליות חמאס, המסיירות מול הקו כדי להפגין משילות על תא שטח שבשליטתן, תוך חריגה לתוך השטח בשליטת כוחות צה"ל, חרף הסימון הברור בשטח. שני האירועים הבולטים האחרונים התרחשו ביום שישי האחרון. הראשון, בשעה 04:00, לאחר שבמרכז רצועת עזה זוהו ארבעה חמושים חוצים את הקו הצהוב לשטח שבשליטת ישראל. כוחות צה"ל מהקרקע ומהאוויר פתחו לעברם באש והרגו שלושה מהם, בעוד שאחד הצליח להימלט. כ-12 שעות לאחר מכן התרחש אירוע נוסף, כשתצפיות זיהו שמונה מחבלים יוצאים מפיר מנהרה ברפיח. כוחות צה"ל פתחו באש והרגו לפחות שלושה מחבלים חמושים. אחד מהם, מפקד פלוגה, נתפס בידי מיליציית אבו שבאב והועבר לידי צה"ל, והיתר נמלטו. ההערכה היא כי עשרות מחבלים נוספים שוהים במרחב התת-קרקעי ברפיח.

title: Doval’s Masterclass: When NSA told US that India wouldn’t be bullied by Trump, his aides
content: The India-US trade deal has brought to the fore some behind-the-curtain discussions that went into resolving the standoff between the two nations. While both countries have confirmed reaching a basic understanding to seal the deal, a report in Bloomberg revealed how India managed to keep the United States in check despite holding Russia’s hand. The report also sheds light on the Doval diplomacy. According to the Bloomberg report, when Prime Minister Narendra Modi held a meeting with Vladimir Putin and Xi Jinping in China during the SCO summit in September last year, India sent its National Security Adviser Ajit Doval to Washington to help smooth tense ties with the US. Add Zee News as a Preferred Source Doval was not only tasked with the work to de-escalate but also to convey to the United States that India wanted to put the acrimony between the two nations behind it and get back to negotiating a trade deal. According to the report, Doval met US Secretary Marco Rubio and conveyed that India wouldn’t be bullied by US President Donald Trump and his top aides. It was conveyed that India is ready to wait for Trump’s tenure to end if the hostilities continue from the US side. Doval also made it clear that India wanted Trump and his aides to dial down their public criticism of India if they wanted to get the relations back on track. Notably, this came in the backdrop of America’s criticism of India for buying Russian oil and not agreeing to the demand of opening the agriculture and dairy sector to the US firms. Trump’s top aides, including Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick and White House Trade Adviser Peter Navarro, were two officials who appeared to have entrusted by the Trump administration to take on India openly. The two officials regularly criticised India and justified the tariffs imposed on Indian products. Despite their rhetoric, India only rejected the charges and allegations while maintaining a firm stand that trade deal talks are going on. The Indian government and former diplomats had described many of these statements as coercive, "ill-informed," and not in line with a strategic partnership.

title: Putin Pushes For DONBAS, Zelensky's SURRENDER As Russia-Ukraine Peace Talks Open Under Fire
content: Russia escalates its demands as U.S.-mediated peace talks with Ukraine open in Abu Dhabi, issuing a stark ultimatum even as diplomacy begins. Moscow insists Kyiv must concede territory or face a continuing war, following a wave of drone and missile attacks that crippled Ukraine’s energy grid amid freezing temperatures. Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky warns Russia has not changed its approach, while U.S. President Donald Trump offers cautious optimism, saying Vladimir Putin briefly honored a pause on strikes. With Russia occupying roughly twenty percent of Ukraine and the fate of Donbas at the centre of talks, negotiators from Kyiv, Moscow, and Washington face a critical moment that could shape the future of Europe’s deadliest conflict since World War 2.

title: Mindful choice or locked in? Study probes feelings about written consent
content: People who sign consent forms feel more trapped – not more empowered – than those who give consent verbally, according to new research by Vanessa Bohns , the Braunstein Family Professor in the ILR School, and co-author Roseanna Sommers of the University of Michigan Law School. Consent forms have proliferated in recent years, thanks to an unlikely alliance between institutions seeking legal protection and advocates hoping to empower the vulnerable with knowledge of their rights. This growing formalization of consent, however, has several unintended consequences, Bohns said. “There is this idea that if we make consent more formal by writing up a consent form and making sure everyone is on board, people will be able to make a mindful choice to agree voluntarily. But what we’re actually finding is that signing a document makes people feel that they can’t go back on their choice,” Bohns said. “So, in the end, people feel more locked into a choice after the fact, even if the form says explicitly they can change their minds.” In the paper, “ Forms of Commitment: Comparing Written and Verbal Consent in Three Psychological Experiments ,” published in the Journal of Legal Studies, Bohns and Sommers found that obtaining consent in writing rather than verbally is counterproductive to having signers feel free to withdraw consent. Bohns and Sommers, who study consent and compliance, argue that consent forms are likely to activate people’s contract schemas – mental scripts people implicitly call upon whenever they encounter documents that resemble contracts. The problem is that these schemas come with psychological baggage. “Even when a consent form doesn’t list any consequences – you’re basically just making a promise – signing something in writing changes a person’s understanding of the situation,” Bohns sad. “Suddenly, it seems like it’s not just a promise; it seems like a binding contract.” To test their hypothesis, Bohns and Sommers conducted two experiments in which participants gave either oral or written consent to have the content of their phones searched. Participants then completed a questionnaire that measured their feelings about their interaction with the experimenter, including trust in the experimenter; the perceived freedom to refuse; and how much they deliberated over the decision to turn over their phones. The results showed that participants in the written consent group were marginally more likely to hand over their phones and reported feeling...

title: GOP Mutiny: Trump Faces Party Revolt As 21 House Republicans TORPEDO Spending Unity | Shutdown
content: Washington narrowly avoided a government shutdown, but the political damage inside the Republican Party may be far from contained. A $1.2 trillion spending bill backed by President Trump and Speaker Mike Johnson passed the House — yet only after a public revolt by 21 Republican lawmakers. The dissenters accused party leaders of surrendering leverage, failing to secure election integrity measures, and shortchanging Homeland Security funding. Trump may have secured a legislative win, but questions now swirl over his grip on party unity. Watch
